response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally beneficial for you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, we are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. We understand its worth to you is $800,000, but this offer represents a fantastic chance for you to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let us know if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
